channel.title: Posts on Leo's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Leo's blog

item.title: Have you played... Grimm's Hollow
item.description: Grimm's Hollow title screen - lots of ghosts in this one I think I’ve already said that, but I love short games with a nice narrative. Grimm’s Hollow is a small RPG Maker game that tells a simple and touching story about grief and loss.

item.title: Motocross Maniacs OST
item.description: So, the other day I was listening to the Rhythm and Pixels Radio while working. Some days I feel that 8-bit old game music really goes well with programming, it helps me get into the groove. One of the songs that played caught my attention though:

item.title: Have you played...? BAD END THEATER
item.description: I wonder what we'll watch in this theater? I bought this some months ago captivated by its premise: a weird game where you decide characters’ fates as if in a theater play, with cute, 8-bit aesthetic? Sign me in! Steam reviews were also overwhelmingly positive and it was not expensive.

item.title: Have you played...? Ann
item.description: “My name is Ann” I’m at the point in my Steam games library where I can’t remember why I have some games - that’s the case for this one. Maybe I’m just a a sucker for meganekko. Actually, I think it was because I came across this funny Youtube video and decided to see what else the creator had done.

item.title: (Piano cover) OMORI - Duet
item.description: Composed by Pedro Silva Arrangement by Pianobin One of the most beautiful and touching moments in videogame history.

item.title: (Piano cover) OMORI - By Your Side
item.description: Composed by Pedro Silva Arrangement by salmonghoul on MuseScore “You’ll forgive yourself… Won’t you… SUNNY?”

item.title: Have you played...? OMORI
item.description: OMORI x Yume Nikki - fan art (Republished on 2024-03-13, originally publised on my Instagram account on 2022-05-09) I’ve finished OMORI recently and enjoyed it a lot. The story and narrative are well developed, and some moments were truly moving.

item.title: Have you played...? Dweller's Empty Path
item.description: Yoki, the stoic main protagonist - fan art (Republished on 2024-03-13, originally publised on my Instagram account on 2021-08-21) Yoki from Dweller’s Empty Path, a delightful little game developed by Temmie Chang (@tuyoki), best known as one of the main artists of indie hit Undertale.

item.title: Você já jogou...? VA-11 Hall-A: Cyberpunk Bartender Action
item.description: (Republished on 2024-02-11, originally publised in Erro Semântico on 2018-03-29) “Time to mix drinks and change lives” Em um futuro próximo, existe uma cidade distópica onde grandes corporações dominam o governo, e a população, oprimida, luta para sobreviver a cada dia.
